### Time Series

```{r warning=F,error=F,message=F,echo=F,results='asis'}
tmpDF <- MSPD
tmpDF[,-1] <- tmpDF[,-1] * 10^-6 
fun_dygraph(obj = tmpDF,colors = 'blue',plotNum = 1,group = 0,legendWidth = 300,
            mainTitle = 'THE PUBLIC DEBT OF THE UNITED STATES(Trillion $) / 米国の公的債務(兆ドル)')
dygraphPlot1 %>% dyBarChart()
```


***

```{r warning=F,error=F,message=F,echo=F,results='hide'}
mergeData <-
  merge(MSPD, allData[,grep('date|grand|japan|china',colnames(allData),ignore.case = T)],by='Date')
ccc1 <- ncol(mergeData) + 1
ccc2 <- 2
ccc3 <- 5
mergeData[,ccc1] <- mergeData[,ccc2] - mergeData[,ccc3]
colnames(mergeData)[ccc1] <- 'U.S. citizens and American entities'
mergeData[,-1] <- mergeData[,-1] * 10^-6
```

### Composition
- `r paste0(colnames(mergeData)[ccc1],':',colnames(mergeData)[ccc2],' minus ',colnames(mergeData)[ccc3])`
- Grand Total: Grand Total of Major Foreign Holders of U.S. Treasury Securities

#### Trillion $

```{r warning=F,error=F,message=F,echo=F,results='asis'}
knitr::kable(fun_transposeDataFrame(obj = mergeData,dateFormat = dateFormat,tailN = 9),
             row.names = F)
```

***
#### Percent

```{r warning=F,error=F,message=F,echo=F,results='asis'}
mergeDataRatio <- mergeData
mergeDataRatio[,-1] <- round(mergeDataRatio[,-1]/mergeDataRatio[,ccc2]*100,1)
knitr::kable(fun_transposeDataFrame(obj = mergeDataRatio,dateFormat = dateFormat,tailN = 9),
             row.names = F)
```

#### Time Series Chart for Composition Ratio of U.S. citizens and American entities

```{r warning=F,error=F,message=F,echo=F,results='asis'}
fun_dygraph(obj = mergeDataRatio[,c(1,ccc1)],legendWidth = 300,plotNum = 2,colors = 'blue',group = 0)
dygraphPlot2 %>% dyBarChart()
```
